DataElement.preferredName: Gleason Histopathologic Grade MVR NCI Concept Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicates why there is no data for "Gleason Histopathologic Grade".

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Gleason Grade for Prostate Cancer Missing Value Reason
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: definition pending_A specific reason explaining why a meaningful value is not available.  A meaningful value answers the question posed by a Data Element Concept.  In contrast, a Missing Value Reason answers the implicit question "Why is there no 'meaningful' value?", when there is none.

Concepts.definition: A grading system for prostatic carcinoma based on the microscopic glandular architectural patterns of the malignant epithelial cells. Nuclear atypia is not evaluated. It defines five patterns or grades which reflect decreasing differentiation.

Property.preferredDefinition: A specific reason explaining why a meaningful value is not available.  A meaningful value answers the question posed by a Data Element Concept.  In contrast, a Missing Value Reason answers the implicit question "Why is there no 'meaningful' value?", when there is none.
